alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:42AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan, northeastern Scott and west central Yell Counties through 215 AM CST... At 142 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waldron, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Cardiff... Waveland... Needmore... Carbon City... Sugar Grove... Driggs... Carolan... Grayson... Olio... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western and central Arkansas.
